meta.title: About | Digital David
meta.description: We're a team of AI Engineers based in Frankfurt. Building production AI since 2020.

hero.title: We're AI Engineers.
hero.subtitle: That's who we are.
hero.description: A small team based in Frankfurt, building production AI since 2020. We were AI Engineers before it was trendy - and we'll be here long after the hype settles.

video.title: Engineers First,
video.description: We started as engineers who got frustrated with AI projects that never made it to production. PowerPoints don't solve business problems. Working code does. That's why we build.
video.since2020Desc: Building production AI before the hype. Still here after.
video.smallTeamDesc: Senior engineers only. No junior consultants learning on your project.
video.frankfurtDesc: In the heart of Europe's financial and tech hub.

philosophy.title: Our Philosophy
philosophy.subtitle: What drives us. What makes us different.
philosophy.boutiqueDesc: We choose our projects. High attention, deep expertise, personal relationships. Premium quality over mass production.
philosophy.productionDesc: We don't do POCs that never ship. We build for production from day one. Working AI, not slideware.
philosophy.ethicalDesc: AI governance isn't overhead - it's our competitive advantage. Responsible AI, transparent decisions, full compliance.

ecosystem.title: The Ecosystem
ecosystem.subtitle: Digital David AG is part of The Digital Workforce Group - a family of companies focused on digital transformation and talent development.
ecosystem.dwgDesc: Cross-industry holding for digital transformation. Consulting, services, and software solutions focused on talent acquisition, digitalization, and artificial intelligence.
ecosystem.ddDesc: The AI engineering powerhouse. We architect, build, and deploy production AI systems.
ecosystem.tsDesc: 1,000+ talents placed, 92% retention. €25,000 training investment per person.
ecosystem.trDesc: Specialized IT recruiting, powered by our own AI technology.

meta.title: AI Engineering | Digital David
meta.description: We architect, build, and deploy AI systems. Agentic AI, LLM engineering, conversational AI, and document intelligence.

hero.title: AI Engineering
hero.description: We don't advise. We architect, build, and deploy. Production AI systems that work from day one.

video.title: Engineering AI That
video.description: We're not consultants who hand over slide decks. We're engineers who build production AI systems. From multi-agent orchestration to document intelligence, we ship working solutions in weeks, not months.
video.shipFastDesc: Days to first value. Working prototypes, not PowerPoints.
video.productionDesc: Enterprise-grade security, scalability, and reliability built in.
video.ownershipDesc: Your code, your IP, your infrastructure. No vendor lock-in.

competencies.title: Our Competencies
competencies.subtitle: Deep expertise in the technologies that matter for 2026 and beyond.
competencies.agenticDesc: Multi-agent orchestration, agent control planes, MCP integration, and workflow automation for enterprise.
competencies.llmDesc: RAG systems, fine-tuning, prompt engineering, model selection, and vector database integration.
competencies.conversationalDesc: Voice agents, chat systems, multi-channel deployment, and 50+ language support.
competencies.documentDesc: Classification, entity extraction, compliance automation, and OCR processing.
competencies.productDesc: Full-stack AI products, white-label solutions, and platform architecture.
competencies.transformDesc: Strategy development, roadmapping, team training, governance, and scale operations.

process.title: How We Work
process.subtitle: Days to first value. Not months.
process.discoverDesc: Understand your business context and AI potential
process.buildDesc: Ship working AI in weeks, not months

cta.videoSubtitle: From concept to production in weeks

meta.title: Services | Digital David
meta.description: High-end AI engineering consultancy. Strategic AI consulting, team ramp-up, methodology frameworks, AI transformation, and enterprise-grade AI implementation.

hero.title: Strategic AI
hero.description: We're not generalists. We're specialized AI engineers who help enterprises navigate the complexity of AI adoption and scale.

video.title: AI Consulting
video.description: Most AI initiatives fail not because of technology, but because of strategy, execution, and change management. We bring the engineering depth to make AI work and the consulting expertise to make it stick.
video.check2: Hands-on engineers, not slide deck consultants

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive AI consulting services designed for enterprise complexity.
services.strategyDesc: We develop enterprise-specific AI strategies aligned with your business goals. We help formulate a clear AI vision, identify high-impact use cases, and create a roadmap that delivers measurable results.
services.roadmapDesc: Detailed implementation roadmaps that prioritize use cases, define milestones, and incorporate change management. We ensure your AI journey is systematic, achievable, and aligned with organizational capacity.
services.transformDesc: Comprehensive support for organization-wide AI transformation. We build AI competencies, train teams, and manage change so AI becomes an integral part of your business processes.
services.teamDesc: Accelerate your internal AI capabilities with embedded experts who work alongside your team. Knowledge transfer, hands-on coaching, and practical skills development.
services.mlopsDesc: Implement MLOps best practices for productive AI operations. We automate the ML lifecycle from data preparation through training, deployment, and continuous monitoring.
services.governanceDesc: Advisory on responsible AI deployment aligned with data privacy, regulation, and ethics. We establish robust AI governance structures that minimize risk and build trust.

methodology.title: Our Methodology
methodology.subtitle: A structured approach that balances rigor with agility.
methodology.discoverDesc: Deep dive into your business context, current capabilities, and AI potential.
methodology.designDesc: Architect the solution, define the approach, and align on success metrics.
methodology.deliverDesc: Iterative implementation with continuous validation and stakeholder engagement.
methodology.scaleDesc: Operationalize, transfer knowledge, and enable continuous improvement.

whyUs.title: Why Digital David
whyUs.subtitle: What sets our consulting apart from traditional firms.
whyUs.expertiseDesc: Specialized engineers in ML, data engineering, and modern AI architectures. We solve complex challenges others can't.
whyUs.industryDesc: Focused expertise in HR Tech, Finance, Healthcare, Legal Tech, and Pharma. We understand your domain.
whyUs.e2eDesc: From strategy through implementation to operations. One partner for your entire AI journey.
whyUs.boutiqueDesc: Selected projects with highest care. Direct access to senior experts, not junior consultants.

engagement.title: Engagement Models
engagement.subtitle: Flexible ways to work together based on your needs.
engagement.advisoryDesc: Strategic guidance and expert review. Ideal for validation, second opinions, and executive-level AI strategy.
engagement.embeddedDesc: Our engineers work alongside your team. Full integration, knowledge transfer, and capability building.
engagement.managedDesc: End-to-end project ownership. We take full responsibility for delivering defined outcomes.

hero.subtitle: Our Next AI Product: The Career Community
hero.description: AI-powered career coaching meets community. Where talents find their tribe, companies build authentic connections, and AI guides every step.

features.coachDesc: Personalized career guidance, CV review, interview prep, and learning recommendations.
features.communityDesc: Tribes based on skills and interests. Network with peers, find mentors, grow together.
features.ambassadorsDesc: Real employees, not recruiters. Authentic connections with actual team members.
features.gamifiedDesc: Rocket Points for engagement. 7 career levels from Starter to Rocket Star.
features.matchingDesc: 92% accuracy AI matching. Intelligent fit scoring between talents and companies.
features.learningDesc: Structured programs, virtual projects, and 1:1 mentorship matching.

foundation.title: Built on Proven Foundation
foundation.description: karriererakete.ai combines Talentschmiede's 14+ years of talent expertise with Digital David's AI engineering capabilities.

meta.title: Products | Digital David
meta.description: Our AI products: Talenty.ai, Talky, DocuGuard.ai, Factify.ai, Factify Pharma Suite, Factify Finance Suite. Production-ready AI platforms serving customers today.

hero.title: Our AI Products
hero.description: We don't just consult - we build and ship. These products serve customers today, proving our engineering capability.

video.title: AI That
video.description: Every product in our portfolio started as a real business challenge. We built these solutions, deployed them to production, and continue to improve them based on real user feedback. This is AI that works today.
video.battleTestedDesc: Production systems serving real customers with real data.
video.enterpriseGradeDesc: Security, compliance, and scalability built from day one.
video.provenRoiDesc: Measurable impact on efficiency, quality, and cost reduction.
